recipe.description: The recipe to craft, including an `id` field which can be any arbitrary (but unique) identifier.
recipe.markdownDescription: The recipe to craft, including an `id` field which can be any arbitrary (but unique) identifier.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Recipe (Power Type) date: 2021-04-08

Recipe

Power Type

Allows a player with this power to craft the defined crafting recipe.

Type ID: origins:recipe

Fields

Field Type Default Description
recipe Crafting Recipe The recipe to craft, including an id field which can be any arbitrary (but unique) identifier.

Examples

{
    "type": "origins:recipe",
    "recipe": {
      	"id": "origins:master_of_webs/web_crafting",
      	"type": "minecraft:crafting_shapeless",
      	"ingredients": [
        	{
          		"item": "minecraft:string"
        	},
        	{
          		"item": "minecraft:string"
        	}
      	],
      	"result": {
        	"item": "minecraft:cobweb"
      	}
    }
}

This example will allow the player that has the power to craft Cobwebs by combining two strings in a crafting grid with no specific order.
